Isabella Rodriguez.description: still working at the counter, taking orders and chatting with customers @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about planning to work on the section about community engagement for Klaus Mueller's paper and scheduling a meeting at Hobbs Cafe with Maria Lopez to discuss interviewing community members. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus! How's the paper coming along? Need any help with it?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria! It's coming along, thank you. I could use some input on the section about community engagement!
Maria Lopez

I'd be happy to help with that! Community engagement is such an important topic. Have you considered exploring different case studies or interviewing community members for a more in-depth perspective?
Klaus Mueller
That's a great idea, Maria! I was actually thinking of conducting some interviews with community members. Would you be interested in helping me with that?
Maria Lopez
I would love to help you with the interviews! Let's plan a time to get started.
Klaus Mueller
Great, Maria! How about we meet at Hobbs Cafe tomorrow at 2pm to plan out our interview approach?
Maria Lopez
Sounds like a plan! I'll see you tomorrow at 2pm at Hobbs Cafe.
